attributes.action: To change the rules on building sites on tradesman having to wear trousers
attributes.additional_details: Having to wear trousers at work isn’t a very comfortable feeling, and can be very draining on you’re body and mind especially when the hot summer days are around, if each tradesman who wanted to wear shorts to work should have a right to sign a weaver form each week allowing them to wear some shorts to work, regardless of the weather, and if any injury’s were cause below shorts and down then the weaver form will stop/prevent a suing as at tradesman’s own fault/risk, this needs to be sorted asap
attributes.background: Loads of tradesman have had enough of having to wear thick heavy duty site trousers or even tracksuit bottoms to work, and having to work on building sites,

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual sites.

You can read more here

https://www.hse.gov.uk/construction/faq-ppe.htm
